value: Logical operators are used to combine two or more conditions.

items: && is known as AND operator.  It checks that two conditions are true then it returns true otherwise returns false
is known as OR operator.  It checks that two conditions and at least 1 condition is true it returns true otherwise returns false
! is known as NOT operator. It reverses the boolean result of the operand (or condition)

value:
var a = 5, b = 10;
console.log((a != b) && (a < b));
console.log((a > b) || (a == b));
console.log((a < b) || (a == b));
console.log(!(a < b));
console.log(!(a > b));
